Reference

Package

lcars-package lcars

lcars: LCARS Aesthetic for Shiny

Datasets

lcarsdata

LCARS colors

UI setup and containers

lcarsPage()

LCARS Shiny UI

lcarsBox()

LCARS box

lcarsSweep()

LCARS sweep

lcarsBracket()

LCARS bracket element

lcarsWell()

LCARS well

inputColumn()

LCARS input column

renderLcarsBox() renderLcarsSweep()

Create an LCARS outputs (server side)

lcarsBoxOutput() lcarsSweepOutput()

Create an LCARS output (client side)

Headers and indicators

lcarsHeader() lcarsh1() lcarsh2() lcarsh3() lcarsh4() lcarsh5() lcarsh6()

LCARS header

lcarsRect() lcarsPill() lcarsLeftPill() lcarsRightPill()

LCARS rectangle element

Input controls

lcarsButton()

LCARS button

lcarsCheckbox()

LCARS checkbox

lcarsToggle()

LCARS toggle button

lcarsRadio() lcarsRadioToggle()

LCARS radio buttons

Shiny demos

lcarsApp()

Launch LCARS demo apps.

Plotting (non-Shiny)

lcars_border()

LCARS border plot

lcars_rect()

LCARS rectangle

lcars_pill() lcars_half_pill() lcars_left_pill() lcars_right_pill() lcars_bottom_pill() lcars_top_pill()

LCARS pill

lcars_elbow()

LCARS corner elbow

Themes

theme_lcars_light() theme_lcars_dark()

LCARS ggplot themes
